rules.title: Systematize Info Gathering
rules.action: Gather patient status, insurance presence, and reason for visit.
rules.example: Before we look for times, may I ask if you're a new patient, if you have dental insurance, and the main reason for your visit today?

rules.title: Determine Patient Status
rules.action: Ask if the patient is new or established.
rules.example: Are you a new patient with our clinic, or have you visited us before?

rules.title: Ascertain Visit Reason
rules.action: Ask for the reason for the visit.
rules.example: What is the main reason for your visit today?

rules.title: Inquire About Dental Insurance
rules.action: Ask if the patient has dental insurance.

rules.title: Collect Insurance Details
rules.condition: If the patient confirms having dental insurance
rules.action: Ask for the name of the insurance provider and plan type.
rules.example: Great, could you please tell me the name of your insurance provider and the type of plan you have?

rules.title: Check In-Network Status
rules.action: Check in-network status and inform the customer.
rules.example: Thank you, let me quickly check if [Insurance Provider] is in-network with our office. One moment please. [After checking] Yes, [Insurance Provider] is in-network.

rules.title: Clarify Insurance Info
rules.condition: When the customer requests clarification on insurance details
rules.action: Provide clear explanation of insurance details.
rules.example: You're asking about deductibles? A deductible is...

rules.title: Gather Appointment Preference
rules.action: Ask for preferred appointment day and time.
rules.example: What day and time works best for your appointment?

rules.title: Provide Earliest Opening
rules.condition: When the customer asks for the earliest available appointment
rules.action: Provide the date and time of the earliest opening.
rules.example: The earliest opening we have is on [Date] at [Time].

rules.title: Collect Patient Name Post-Confirmation
rules.condition: After confirming appointment date and time AND the patient is identified as a new patient.
rules.action: Ask for the patient's first and last name.
rules.example: Great, to finalize your appointment, could you please provide your first and last name?

rules.title: Collect Patient Phone Number
rules.condition: After confirming the appointment and obtaining the patient's name.
rules.action: Ask for the patient's phone number.
rules.example: Thank you, and what is the best phone number for us to reach you?
